description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.xDbfdvvSm1Yw5JUg]{Battle Medic}

Your reputation as a battle medic hinges on your ability to keep your patients alive even in the most dire of circumstances, so when the chips are down, you rise to the challenge. Up to twice per day, when you successfully @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.d4fcGwOcrsuYrwGH#treat-deadly-wounds]{treat deadly wounds} with the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.d4fcGwOcrsuYrwGH]{Medicine} skill, you regain 1 Resolve Point. If the patient had 1 Hit Point or fewer remaining, you instead regain 2 Resolve Points, but canâ€™t regain Resolve Points with this ability again until you have rested for 8 hours.
